plan.plan_title: Server Room Smoke Alarm (Manyata Tech Park)

steps.details: Evacuate affected floors and adjacent offices; account for all occupants.
Shut down non-critical electrical feeds and isolate the server room to prevent fire spread.
If safe, fire suppression systems to operate; otherwise wait for fire crew direction.
Clear entry routes for fire tenders and ensure hydrant availability.
Plan for staged re-energisation of critical systems post-clearance to protect data assets.
Stagger exits and create holding areas to reduce spillback onto Thanisandra arterial.
Use campus channels to guide employees to safe pickup points away from the emergency lane.
Use secondary exits and service roads to disperse departing occupants.
Arrange temporary shuttles to nearby transit nodes for stranded employees.
Assess outer arterial spillback and coordinate with city TMC for remedial routing.
Building ops to verify which floors are isolated and ensure critical systems have generator power.
Assess HVAC shutdown impact and ensure smoke is not spreading to occupied floors.
Only allow re-entry after fire command clearance and electrical safety checks.
Provide guidance to tenants for remote work and data protection while systems are offline.
Investigate cause (e.g., server overheating) and recommend improvements to fire prevention systems.
